scenes.title: The Iron Maw
scenes.text: They pushed through the rusted gate. Iron groaned. The sound echoed, too loud, too long. Darkness deepened, supernatural, swallowing the last of the fading light. The gates behind them slammed shut, a final, metallic shriek. A spectral hand, cold and translucent, brushed their neck. It felt like dry bone. The prison was alive.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A decaying prison entrance, rusty iron gates in the foreground, half-open, leading to a dark, narrow corridor. A barely visible spectral hand, transparent and elongated, reaches from the right side of the frame towards the viewer. Overgrown weeds on the cracked concrete ground, a single flickering fluorescent light overhead.

choices.text: Head into the main cell block, seeking a path through.
Ascend to the guard tower for a better view, a vantage point.

scenes.title: Whispering Walls
scenes.text: The main cell block was a concrete maw. Cells shuddered on their own. Bedsheets rippled with unseen motion inside locked rooms. A janitor's cart, rusted and abandoned, rolled past them, scraping on the concrete. A gaunt, skeletal face briefly pressed against the bars of a nearby cell, then melted back into the shadows. Tortured whispers filled the air, a chorus of forgotten pain.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A long, grimy prison cell block corridor, with rows of metal cells on either side. A janitor's cart, with rusted wheels, is autonomously rolling from left to right in the midground. A ghostly, emaciated face is momentarily visible, pressed against the bars of a cell on the right, barely discernible in the deep shadows.

choices.text: Investigate the cells, where the whispers are strongest.
Push through to the administrative offices, hoping for an exit.

scenes.title: Static Ascent
scenes.text: The guard tower stairs creaked, then groaned under unseen weight. The radio on the console crackled with distorted, guttural voices. A lever violently pulled itself, causing the searchlight outside to sweep erratically. Its beam momentarily illuminated grotesque carvings on the inner walls. A monstrous, multi-limbed creature, made of solidified darkness and prison debris, skittered across the far wall, then vanished with a wet sound.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. Interior of a derelict prison guard tower control room. A vintage radio on a console is sparking, wires exposed. A large, rusty lever is pulled down by an invisible force. On the back wall, grotesque, claw-like carvings are briefly illuminated by an erratic searchlight beam. A shadowy, multi-limbed creature is a blur across the top right of the frame.

choices.text: Descend towards the lower levels, the solitary wing calls.
Attempt to reactivate the communications array for help.

scenes.title: The Cell's Embrace
scenes.text: They pushed into a cell. The air hung thick, foul. Darkness coiled, coalescing into a grotesque, veined mass directly in front of them. It heaved, struggling for human form, raw muscle twisting, bones cracking. A barbed limb, slick with black ichor, lashed out, tearing at their arm. Pain erupted. The stench of decay choked them. This was not spectral. This was hungry. Its mouth, a jagged tear in its flesh, opened in a silent scream.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. Inside a cramped, decaying prison cell. A monstrous, contorted mass of veined, purplish flesh and dark shadow, roughly humanoid but grotesque, stands in the center, a barbed limb extended, dripping black ichor. The figure has a jagged, toothless mouth. Rusty metal bunk beds on the left, a broken toilet on the right. The creature's 'face' is focused on the viewer, expressing hunger.

choices.text: Fight back with a makeshift weapon, aiming for its core.
Smash through the crumbling back wall, seeking an unknown passage.

scenes.title: Archives Animate
scenes.text: The administrative offices were chaos. Files flew from cabinets, fluttering like dead birds. Typewriters clattered on their own. A tall, hunched figure, limbs stretched and broken at unnatural angles, emerged from the swirling papers. Its eyes burned with malevolent red light. It let out a guttural shriek that scraped against their bones. It moved with sickening speed, a broken puppet controlled by an unseen, malevolent force.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A ransacked administrative office in a prison. Paper files are flying violently through the air. A tall, hunched creature with elongated, broken limbs and glowing red eyes stands in the center, its body composed of swirling darkness and office debris. Desks and chairs are overturned. A vintage typewriter clatters on a table in the foreground.

choices.text: Run for the infirmary, perhaps there's a way to ward it off.
Confront the creature, using the office furniture for cover.

scenes.title: Solitary's Kiss
scenes.text: Solitary confinement. The cells were too small, too dark. The air here was absolute blackness, thick and palpable. It pressed in, morphing into spectral hands that tore at their clothes, at their skin. Whispers turned to screams, and then the screams were their own. There was no escape from the endless, consuming void. It was an embrace. They struggled, but the dark won. Forever.

Inside a tiny, pitch-black solitary confinement cell, barely illuminated. Numerous translucent, spectral hands are reaching from the walls and ceiling, tearing at the viewer's clothes and skin (implied, not fully shown for first-person perspective). The sense of absolute darkness and claustrophobia is overwhelming, with faint, distorted screams echoing.

scenes.title: Pulsing Core
scenes.text: The communications room was an abomination. Wires writhed like snakes, coiling around a central console. A massive, pulsating organ of flesh and rusted metal had grown from the floor, engulfing the equipment. It breathed with wet, rasping sounds. This was the source of the static, of the twisted signals, of the very darkness permeating the prison. It pulsed, an obscene heart.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A communications room transformed. Coiling, fleshy wires writhe around a central console, which is now enveloped by a massive, pulsating, visceral organ of mottled flesh and rusted metal. The organ takes up the center of the frame, pulsating with a sickly green light from within. Drops of dark fluid drip from its surface onto the floor. Old, broken radio equipment lies scattered.

choices.text: Sever the fleshy growths, hoping to disrupt its power.
Abandon the array and search for old maintenance tunnels.

scenes.title: Ruptured Viscera
scenes.text: They swung the steel pipe with desperate force. It struck true. The grotesque creature shrieked, a sound of tearing fabric and breaking bone. Its form writhed, a torrent of decaying flesh and rusted metal, convulsing violently. They struck again, and again, adrenaline pumping. Finally, it collapsed, dissolving into black ichor and a broken pile of prison materials. The immediate threat gone, a path to the main courtyard, surprisingly free of deeper shadows, lay clear. Freedom beckoned, a distant, hopeful gleam.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A gruesome scene in a prison cell. A grotesque creature, made of decaying flesh and rusted metal, lies dismembered and dissolved into black ichor and broken debris on the floor. A rusty steel pipe, stained dark, is prominently visible near the remains. Beyond the cell, a glimpse of a relatively clear, moonlit prison courtyard is visible through a doorway, offering a stark contrast to the horror within.

scenes.title: Ancient Revelation
scenes.text: They smashed through the crumbling back wall, revealing not solid rock, but a hidden passage. It was cold, damp, and ancient, stretching deeper than the prison itself. Crude pictographs covered the walls: disturbing images of rituals, sacrifices, an entity feeding on despair, its form like a hunger made real. This prison was merely a veil, built upon something far older, far more terrible. The truth was a sickening weight. They had found the true heart of the malevolence, a forgotten evil that predated the brick and iron.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A dark, ancient, hidden passage revealed behind a broken prison cell wall. The passage walls are covered in crude, disturbing pictographs depicting figures performing dark rituals and sacrifices, with a monstrous, shadowy entity at the center, its form indistinct but menacing. The air feels heavy and cold. Damp stone. A single, weak lantern light source.

scenes.title: Shattered Darkness
scenes.text: They overturned a heavy desk, sending a cascade of papers flying, a desperate barrier. The hunched creature shrieked again, lunging. They fought dirty, kicking, striking with whatever came to hand. The creature was powerful, but not invulnerable. A lucky, desperate blow with a heavy stapler to its head, and it shattered into countless shards of darkness, dissolving into nothingness. The path was now clear to a maintenance tunnel, a route to the outside, away from this cursed place.

A dimly lit maintenance tunnel entrance is visible in the background, offering a narrow path to escape.

scenes.title: Surgical Horror
scenes.text: They burst into the infirmary. Instruments clattered, lifted by unseen hands. A spectral doctor, elongated and impossibly thin, floated over a rusted operating table, gesturing with a bloodied scalpel. Jars filled with deformed organs lined the shelves, pulsating softly. They realized the entity did not want to kill them. It wanted to operate. To 'fix' them into its own grotesque, suffering image. The cold steel of the scalpel approached their face. This was not an end, but a new beginning, a horrific change.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. Shelves on the back wall are lined with glass jars containing pulsating, deformed organs. The air is thick with dread, a sense of impending, grotesque surgery.

scenes.title: Source Banished
scenes.text: They hacked at the pulsating growths with frantic urgency. Black, viscous blood spurted, burning their skin. The entire room convulsed, the ground shaking. The air crackled with raw, malevolent energy. With a final, desperate effort, they severed the last connection to the console. The organ shriveled, collapsing in on itself with a wet, sucking sound. A pure, blinding light erupted from the console, then dissipated, leaving the communications array intact. The prison stills. The pervasive evil presence lifted. The source was gone. Banished.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, wide cinematic perspective, movie-like framing, dim ambient lighting, soft diffused shadows, muted reds and greens, classic horror palette, subtle film grain. A bright, ethereal light emanates from the now-intact communications console, dissipating into the air. Black, viscous blood stains the console and floor. A sense of eerie calm has replaced the previous horror.

scenes.title: Chasm's Embrace
scenes.text: The old tunnels were dark, filled with stagnant, oily water that shimmered with unnatural colors. The air grew thick, heavy, smelling of decay and something far older. Strange, chitinous sounds echoed from deeper below, clicks and scrapes that promised horrors beyond comprehension. They stumbled, losing their footing on slick, unseen stone, falling into a deeper chasm, a lightless pit. The cold consumed them. The dark embraced them. Forever. There was only the endless void.

The perspective is from the edge of a deep, black chasm, looking down into an abyss where nothing can be seen. Vague, chitinous shadows might be barely discernible on the edges of the abyss.
